articles.title: About this blog
articles.description: It is my notebook about statistical computing.
articles.contents:
Iâ€™ve been writing code to analyse data for a few years now. I read books, did courses, solved problems, and filled pages of notebooks accumulating piles of useful information. Most of it is forgotten or lost.
This site will be a repository of all of that from now on so I can always find it if I need it again.
